segments.text: Hey , look , there is a circus show over there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't want to sit there and watch them torturing the animals .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , come on , they give them treat too.Oh , look , that little monkey is so cute .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , it is coming to us , come on , Ben , get a banana to it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Me ? No way , keep him away from me , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why are you acting so strange today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've said that I've got a problem with the circus . I'm not kidding .
segments.speaker: S2
